Prof Ismail Said presented a paper at First International Conference Islamic and Sustainable Innovation of Urban and Regional Planning (ICoISI)
===============================================================================================================================================

by [webmaster](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/author/sazizul/ "Posts by webmaster")
 | Nov 28, 2019 | [Conference & Seminar](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/conference-seminar/)
, [News](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/news/)

![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/77067166_2866433760068678_4648184212422131712_o-1080x675.jpg)

Prof Ismail Said presented a paper “Cultural Ecosystem Services of Park to Urban Community and its Paradoxical Contribution to Carbon Emission” at First International Conference Islamic and Sustainable Innovation of Urban and Regional Planning hosted by Universitas Islam Negeri Alauddin in Makassar.
